commands: docker exec milo_postgres psql -U postgres -d milo -c 'ALTER TABLE tasks ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS sub_project_id INTEGER;'
docker exec milo_postgres psql -U postgres -d milo -c 'CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_tasks_sub_project_id ON tasks(sub_project_id);'
docker exec milo_postgres psql -U postgres -d milo -c 'SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = \047tasks\047 AND column_name = \047sub_project_id\047;'
